Module Visualization¶

visualization.animate_cars(number_frame, lead_position_profile, acc_position_profile, lead_acceleration_profile, acc_acceleration_profile, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param)[source]¶

Creation of GIF with ACC vehicle following leading vehicle

Parameters

  • number_frame (int) – current time step

  • lead_position_profile (List[float]) – position profile of lead vehicle

  • acc_position_profile (List[float]) – position profile of ACC vehicle

  • lead_acceleration_profile (List[float]) – acceleration profile of lead vehicle

  • acc_acceleration_profile (List[float]) – acceleration position profile of ACC vehicle

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

visualization.animate_profiles(number_frame, lead_vehicle_profile, acc_profile, time_profile, x_label, y_label, x_min, x_max, y_min, y_max)[source]¶

Creation of GIF based on profiles of leading and ACC vehicle

Parameters

  • number_frame (int) – current time step

  • lead_vehicle_profile (List[float]) – profile of leading vehicle

  • acc_profile (List[float]) – profile of ACC vehicle

  • time_profile (List[float]) – list with all time steps

  • x_label (str) – label of x-axis

  • y_label (str) – label of y-axis

  • x_min (float) – minimum value of x-axis

  • x_max (float) – maximum value of x-axis

  • y_min (float) – minimum value of y-axis

  • y_max (float) – maximum value of y-axis

visualization.create_profiles(node_list, simulation_param, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param)[source]¶

Plotting of positions, acceleration, velocity, and distance of ACC and lead vehicle, respectively

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes from the last time step

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with simulation-specific parameters

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC-equipped vehicle

Return type

Tuple[Union[ndarray, List[float]], List[float], List[float], List[float], List[float], List[float], List[float], List[float], List[float], List[float]]

visualization.plot_figures(node_list, simulation_param, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param)[source]¶

Plotting of positions, acceleration, velocity, and distance of ACC and leading vehicle, respectively

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes from the last time step

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with simulation-specific parameters

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the leading vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

visualization.store_videos(node_list, simulation_param, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param)[source]¶

Creation of profile videos and car following video

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes from the last time step

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with simulation specific parameters

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle
